divs: sighting detailsi saw and reported a ufo on february 8, 2009 to mufon. i reported the object broke apart and rejoined and was illuminated bright white like a star the entire time. after doing some research on the internet, i think the craft i saw was either a flat top or saturn - like ufo. maybe a conical - hat or a dome shaped. according to what i have read on the internet, these shapes can be hard to distinguish because a halo surronds the craft. i read the types i mentioned above have been reported as being illuminated bright white. i don't know about other sightings of them breaking apart and rejoining. these \ the craft were silent. when the object broke apart it could be considerd chevron - like or airplane - like (both objects). just wanted to add this to my description. i do not wnat my name on the internet, but have no problem being contacted by a mufon representative.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: UFO seen in Caseyville, IL at Far Oaks Golf Course.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Caseyville
There were no other sightings in Caseyville on or around November 30th 2002
